title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Women in Transport
purpose: To provide a forum to discuss and overcome the under-representation of women in transport by promoting best practice examples of employers leading the way in gender diversifying their workforce and by being the voice for all women using the UK’s transport networks.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 7389.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Jo Field, Women in Transport. Tel: 020 8050 3156
contact_details.secretariat: Women in Transport acts as the group's secretariat.http://womenintransport.com/

detailed_benefits.Description: JFG Communications acts as secretariat on behalf of Women in Transport and is part-funded by West Coast Partnership to do so. From: 12/02/2025 To: 11/02/2026
